questions.question:
User: Hi! What sort of movies do you like?
System: I really enjoy drama/biography. For example I enjoyed Phantom Thread (2017)
User: Oh, that's a movie I haven't seen. If you like Drama, I really enjoyed Allied (2016) recently.
System: I think that's on my list to see. Did you see The Darkest Hour (2011) ?
User: Yes it was fab! I also really enjoyed Dunkirk (2017) - I haven't watched the original yet, but it is on my list. Have you seen Dunkirk (2017) ?
System: That should have been Darkest Hour (2017)
User: Do you enjoy war movies?
System: Yes, loved Dunkirk (2017) I really want to see 12 Strong (2018) I didn't see it in the theater because the reviews weren't all that great
User: I do like the classics.. I can recommend Ice Cold in Alex (1958) and Battle of Britain (1969) for a Sunday afternoon marathon. I've not seen 12 Strong (2018) - I will have to check it out.
System: One of my favorite films was The Hurt Locker (2008)
User: Jodie Foster? I don't think I've seen it...
System: Oh, you'd like it! Gotta go watch some movies now.
